name: Essential Wellness Solutions LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Essential Wellness Solutions LLC is a Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in Mesa, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $8.7M in Medicaid payments across 8K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $8.7M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
